item.title: 澳大利亚伍尔沃斯公司上半年利润下降 21
item.description: 伍尔沃斯集团（Woolworths Group）周三报告称，其半年基本利润下降了近 21%，原因是为吸引价格敏感型顾客而提高折扣率挤压了利润空间，并影响了其主要部门的盈利。【原文：Woolworths Group reported a nearly 21% drop in its half-year underlying profit on Wednesday, as higher discounts to lure price-conscious customers squeezed margins and impacted earnings across its key divisions.】

item.title: First Solar 预计 2025 年销售额将增长，并对晶科能源采取法律行动
item.description: 太阳能电池板制造商第一太阳能公司（First Solar）周二预测今年的销售额将有所增长，第四季度利润将有所上升，并表示已对晶科能源的专利侵权行为提起法律诉讼。【原文：Solar panel maker First Solar forecast higher current-year sales, and posted a rise in fourth-quarter profit on Tuesday, and said it has initiated legal action against JinkoSolar for patent infringement.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司批准进一步暂停 E175-E2 喷气式飞机的研制工作
item.description: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）周二发布的一份证券文件显示，该公司董事会批准将E175-E2喷气机的研发计划再暂停四年。【原文：Brazilian plane maker Embraer said on Tuesday its board approved an additional four-year pause in the development program of E175-E2 jet, according to a securities filing.】

item.title: 卡瓦集团年度销售增长目标低于预期
item.description: 卡瓦集团（Cava Group）周二预测，由于美国外出就餐需求疲软，餐馆不得不对今年的预期持谨慎态度，因此全年同店销售额的增幅将大大低于预期。【原文：Cava Group on Tuesday forecast annual same-store sales growth largely below estimates as weak demand for dining out in the United States forces restaurants to take a cautious stance on their expectations for the year.】

item.title: 早间竞价：对美国经济增长的担忧和科技股下跌导致债券收益率下滑
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: Axon Enterprise 预测 2025 年业绩强劲，季度业绩超出预期
item.description: 由于软件产品和 TASER 设备的需求持续强劲，Axon Enterprise 周二预计全年收入将超过预期。【原文：Axon Enterprise forecast its annual revenue above estimates on Tuesday, following robust quarterly results, banking on sustained strong demand for its software products and TASER devices.】

item.title: 需求稳定，Workday 季度收入超出预期
item.description: 周二，Workday 第四季度营收超出华尔街预期，得益于客户在经济放缓的情况下增加支出，对其人力资本管理软件的需求强劲。【原文：Workday beat Wall Street expectations for fourth-quarter revenue on Tuesday, benefiting from strong demand for its human capital management software as clients increased spending in an easing economy.】

item.title: 麦当劳撇开鸡蛋附加费吸引顾客
item.description: 麦当劳周二表示，在提供鸡蛋作为餐食的一部分时不会征收任何附加费用，还将在其应用程序上推出1美元的麦松饼，以吸引美国消费者。【原文：McDonald's said on Tuesday it would not impose any surcharges when serving eggs as part of its meals and will also launch $1 McMuffins on its app, in a move to attract consumers in the United States.】

item.title: 特朗普下令对美国进口铜进行新的关税调查
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周二开辟了他攻击全球贸易准则的另一条战线，下令对可能对进口铜征收的新关税展开新的调查，以重建美国对电动汽车、军事硬件、半导体和各种消费品至关重要的金属的生产。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Tuesday opened yet another front in his assault on global trade norms, ordering a new probe into possible new tariffs on copper imports to rebuild U.S. production of a metal critical to electric vehicles, military hardware, semiconductors and a wide range of consumer goods.】

item.title: Lucid 表示首席执行官将卸任，今年汽车产量将增加一倍多
item.description: 电动汽车制造商 Lucid 集团周二表示，公司首席执行官彼得-罗林森（Peter Rawlinson）将卸任，公司股价在盘后交易中上涨了 6%。【原文：Electric-vehicle maker Lucid Group said on Tuesday its Chief Executive Officer Peter Rawlinson will step down from the role, sending the company's shares up 6% in extended trading.】

item.title: 澳大利亚林纳斯稀土公司上半年利润因价格疲软而大幅下滑
item.description: 澳大利亚林纳斯稀土公司（Lynas Rare Earths）周三报告称，受变现价格疲软和中国需求低迷的影响，该公司上半年利润降幅超过预期。【原文：Australia's Lynas Rare Earths reported a steeper-than-expected drop in its first-half profit on Wednesday, hurt by soft realised prices and subdued demand from China.】

item.title: Intuit 的人工智能财务工具提高了第三季度收入预期
item.description: TurboTax 制造商 Intuit 周二预测第三季度营收将高于华尔街预期，押注其人工智能驱动的金融服务软件的需求增长，这使得该公司股价在延时交易中上涨了近 3%。【原文：TurboTax maker Intuit forecast third-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, betting on growing demand for its AI-driven financial services software, sending the company's shares up nearly 3% in extended trading.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟发现公司发言人称关闭三家电子游戏工作室
item.description: 华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros Discovery）游戏部门发言人周二表示，该公司将关闭三个电子游戏开发工作室，此举的目的是在市场复苏乏力的情况下提高游戏部门的盈利能力。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery is shutting down three of its videogame development studios in a move aimed at boosting profitability for its gaming division amid a sluggish recovery in the market, a spokesperson for the company's games unit said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 部长表示，尽管面临关税威胁，加拿大仍有可能参与赛峰集团工厂的竞标
item.description: 加拿大工业部长周二表示，尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）下周可能会对加拿大征收 25% 的关税，但加拿大仍然是法国赛峰集团碳制动器工厂的竞争者。【原文：Canada remains a contender for a carbon brakes factory from France's Safran , the Canadian industry minister said on Tuesday, despite the looming threat of 25% tariffs next week from U.S. President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 增长忧虑抑制国债收益率上升
item.description: 经济疲软以及看似过于激进的 "特朗普交易"，使得一些国债市场参与者重新评估了有关美国收益率将走多高的呼声，因为美联储今年可能多次降息的猜测再次出现。【原文：A weakening economy and what looks to have been an overly aggressive "Trump trade" has led some Treasury market participants to reevaluate calls for how high U.S. yields will go as speculation the Federal Reserve may cut rates several times this year re-emerge.】

item.title: 独家报道刚果权衡钴出口配额以在供应过剩的情况下重振价格
item.description: 三位熟知详情的消息人士告诉路透社，刚果民主共和国正在考虑引入钴出口配额，因为这个世界上最大的电池金属供应国正寻求抑制供应过剩和提振价格。【原文：The Democratic Republic of Congo is considering introducing cobalt export quotas as the world's biggest supplier of the battery metal seeks to curb oversupply and boost prices, three sources familiar with the details told Reuters.】

item.title: 据 CNBC 报道，Holtec 与现代集团签署协议，在帕利塞德核电站建造小型核反应堆
item.description: 据 CNBC 周二报道，霍尔泰克国际公司已与现代工程建设公司签署协议，将在密歇根州帕利塞德核电站建造两座小型模块化反应堆（SMR）。【原文：Holtec International has signed an agreement with Hyundai Engineering and Construction to build two small modular reactors (SMRs) at the Palisades nuclear plant in Michigan, CNBC reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 达索系统与苹果公司合作在 Vision Pro 上安装工业 3D 软件
item.description: 达索系统（Dassault Systèmes）周二表示，该公司已与苹果公司合作，将苹果的 Vision Pro 集成到其 3D 软件中，该软件广泛应用于制造业、生命科学和城市规划领域。【原文：Dassault Systèmes on Tuesday said that it has worked with Apple to integrate Apple's Vision Pro into its 3D software, which is widely used in manufacturing, life sciences and urban planning.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，美国支付公司 Cantaloupe 正在探索包括出售在内的各种方案
item.description: 四位熟悉此事的人士表示，Cantaloupe 公司正在探索战略选择，包括潜在的出售或私有化交易，这是最近一家考虑采取这种行动的美国专业支付处理商。【原文：Cantaloupe is exploring strategic options, including a potential sale or a go-private transaction, four people familiar with the matter said, the latest specialized U.S. payments processor to consider such a move.】

item.title: 想聘请埃隆-马斯克的律师？每小时 3000 美元
item.description: 亿万富翁特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）和陷入困境的纽约市长埃里克-亚当斯（Eric Adams）的主要律师现在的标准收费标准是每小时 3000 美元，这使他在曼哈顿最昂贵的律师中也名列前茅。【原文：A leading attorney for billionaire Tesla CEO Elon Musk and embattled New York Mayor Eric Adams now has a standard billing rate of $3,000 an hour, placing him on the top shelf among even the priciest of Manhattan lawyers.】

item.title: Meta 必须面对声称其偏爱廉价外国工人的诉讼
item.description: 一名联邦法官周二表示，Meta Platforms 必须面对一项诉讼，该诉讼称 Facebook 和 Instagram 的母公司更愿意雇用外国工人，因为可以支付比美国工人更低的工资。【原文：A federal judge on Tuesday said Meta Platforms must face a lawsuit claiming that the Facebook and Instagram parent prefers to hire foreign workers because it can pay them less than American workers.】

item.title: 监管机构调整 "问题银行 "追踪，美国银行利润攀升
item.description: 美国银行业监管机构周二发布报告称，2024 年第四季度美国银行业利润增长 2.3%，达到 668 亿美元，该机构还宣布将更新对所谓问题银行的跟踪方式。【原文：U.S. banking sector profits rose 2.3% to $66.8 billion in the fourth quarter of 2024, a bank regulator reported on Tuesday, as it also announced moves to update how so-called problem banks are tracked.】

item.title: 欧洲销量下滑，特斯拉市值跌破 1 万亿美元
item.description: 周二，特斯拉股价暴跌 8%，市值自 11 月以来首次跌破 1 万亿美元，此前数据显示这家电动汽车制造商 1 月份在欧洲的销量下滑。【原文：Tesla's stock tumbled 8% on Tuesday, pushing its market value below $1 trillion for the first time since November after data showed the electric car maker's sales slumped in Europe in January.】

item.title: Worldline 任命皮埃尔-安托万-江诗丹顿为首席执行官
item.description: 法国数字支付公司 Worldline 周二表示，已任命皮埃尔-安托万-瓦谢龙（Pierre-Antoine Vacheron）为首席执行官。【原文：French digital payments company Worldline has appointed Pierre-Antoine Vacheron as CEO, it said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美联储主席巴金不确定性要求对货币政策采取谨慎态度
item.description: 里士满联储主席汤姆-巴金（Tom Barkin）周二表示，他将对央行的利率政策采取观望态度，直到通胀率明确恢复到美联储 2% 的目标为止。【原文：Richmond Federal Reserve President Tom Barkin said on Tuesday he will follow a wait-and-see approach regarding central bank interest rate policy until it is clear inflation is returning to the Fed's 2% target.】

item.title: 人工智能类股受挫，英伟达财报成败在此一举
item.description: 在人工智能风向标英伟达（Nvidia）发布季度财报之前，与人工智能相关的股票周二下跌。【原文：Artificial intelligence-linked shares fell on Tuesday, in lead-up to AI bellwether Nvidia's quarterly earnings, which could offer clarity on demand and justify the sector's lofty valuations.】

item.title: ASM 国际公司第四季度订单低于预期
item.description: 计算机芯片设备制造商 ASM International（ASMI）周二公布的第四季度订单低于分析师预期。【原文：Computer chip equipment maker ASM International (ASMI) reported fourth-quarter orders below analyst expectations on Tuesday.】

item.title: 俄罗斯 Avtovaz 公司称雷诺俄罗斯回购计划至少耗资 13 亿美元
item.description: Avtovaz公司表示，如果法国汽车制造商雷诺希望回购其在俄罗斯顶级汽车制造商Avtovaz公司的多数股份，则必须支付至少1125亿卢布（13亿美元），以弥补自2022年以仅1卢布的价格出售股份以来所做的投资。【原文：Should French carmaker Renault wish to buy back its majority stake in Russia's top carmaker Avtovaz, it would have to pay at least 112.5 billion roubles ($1.3 billion) to cover investments made since selling for only one rouble in 2022, Avtovaz said.】

item.title: 消费者信心下滑，美联储将于 6 月恢复降息
item.description: 本周二，交易员们押注美联储很可能在6月份恢复降息，并可能在9月份再次降低短期借贷成本，因为他们考虑到了一项广受关注的调查的影响，该调查显示本月消费者信心下滑，通胀预期飙升。【原文：The Federal Reserve is likely to resume cutting interest rates in June and could reduce short-term borrowing costs again in September, traders bet on Tuesday as they took on board the implications of a widely watched survey that showed consumer confidence dove this month, and inflation expectations surged.】

item.title: 苹果投资者拒绝接受反对德意志投资公司政策的提议
item.description: 苹果公司股东在周二的投资者会议上否决了一项反对其多元化、公平和包容性政策的提案，在美国反对此类努力的声浪日益高涨之际，这家科技巨头取得了重大胜利。【原文：Apple shareholders rejected a proposal against its diversity, equity and inclusion policies at an investor meeting on Tuesday, handing a major victory to the tech giant as opposition against such efforts gains traction in the U.S.】
